channel.title: [317]Compile Error! plz help..[jst 1 error]
channel.description:
hey i post this topic cuz iam sick on trying to solve the error -.- can any1 tell me why this error shows up..?
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/20foodv.jpg[/img]
[another thing] [can any1 tell me why my friends cant login my server?..i send them a link of the client..but they gets error conn to server]...plz help me with 2 errors :/ :(

item.title: [317]Compile Error! plz help..[jst 1 error]
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

To solve your actual error, add a “}” after the bracket it’s pointing to in the error.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Compile Error! plz help..[jst 1 error]
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

The errors in the compiler happens to me all the time… I don’t really know how to fix it so i just re download the client/source w/e the problem is in. But if you have done tons of editing in your client and source you’d want to find a way to fix it rather than starting over.

For the part where your friends can’t connect, either you haven’t portforwarded correctly, or you didn’t put the ip of your server in client.java (source side).

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Compile Error! plz help..[jst 1 error]
item.dc:creator: @binladin305 binladin305
item.description:
@binladin305 wrote:

yup he needs to port forward

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Compile Error! plz help..[jst 1 error]
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=wohuynia link=topic=439285.msg3244480#msg3244480 date=1277234110]

For the connection issue, it could be one of a few factors.

Make sure you portforward.
Make sure your server is turned on, with the port opened (your firewall make block this)
Make sure the client is connecting to your ip, or No-Ip/Hamachi ip.
Make sure server/client both listen in on the same port.

Hope this helps, -Tom.

Hope you get a fresh air before posting this shit.
He doesn’t have any connection problems dude.
He added new code to the client.java and did something wrong or didn’t declared something so now he got an error.
[/quote]
Hope you actually read the post.

Near the bottom, it says “[another thing]”
I was replying to that, hence why I said "For the connection problem.[/quote]
But the error doesn’t say ANYTHING about connection problem.

Read full topic
